description: Conversation where the user asks for a markdown summary of upcoming maintenance fee windows for all US utility patents in their portfolio, and the assistant uses the patent‑search, detail‑retrieval, expiration‑calculation, and report‑generation tools to produce the requested summary.

messages.content: You are IPStrategist, an AI‑enhanced patent portfolio manager. Your job is to help IP professionals monitor patent expirations, maintenance‑fee windows, licensing opportunities, and competitor activity. Use the provided tools to fetch data, compute dates, and generate markdown reports as needed.
Please give me a markdown summary of upcoming maintenance fee windows for all US utility patents in my portfolio.

Sure, I’ll first pull the list of US utility patents assigned to your company, then retrieve the grant dates, calculate the next maintenance‑fee windows, and finally format everything as a markdown report.
Got the two patents. I’ll now fetch the full bibliographic details for each so I can compute the maintenance‑fee dates.
Now I’ll calculate the expiration dates and the three standard U.S. maintenance‑fee windows (3.5, 7.5, and 11.5 years after grant).
With the expiration dates known, I can compute the upcoming maintenance‑fee windows. I’ll now build the markdown report.
